trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_SEQ_00<tab>Dadanen would like you to deliver a message to Copperbell Mines.

TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_SEQ_01<tab>Dadanen has yet to receive a delivery from Copperbell Mines, and his patience is wearing thin. Deliver his notice to Drunken Stag, the miner whom he hired to deliver his product.
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_SEQ_02<tab>Drunken Stag is powerless to act, as the mines have been closed due to an incident in the depths. However, he did mention losing a haul not far from here...
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_TODO_00<tab>Deliver Dadanen's final notice to Drunken Stag.
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_000<tab>It so happens that I've a situation that must be resolved posthaste─and I do mean <var 1A 02 /var>posthaste<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_001<tab>I'm plumb out of premium product, and my latest order has yet to arrive! If I keep my customers waiting any longer, this could irrevocably damage my reputation!

TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_002<tab>What's worse, I paid my man in advance for his services. Despite his assurances that it would be a simple affair, I've heard nothing since he departed for Copperbell Mines days ago.
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_003<tab>Find Drunken Stag and give him this notice. I cannot afford any further delay.
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_010<tab>What do you want? Hm? Dadanen's product?
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_011<tab>He can send all the notices he likes, but it won't change a thing.
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_012<tab>The Concern has closed the mines due to some incident in the depths.
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_013<tab>It's a godsdamned shame too─lost a decent haul just over yonder during all the chaos...
